DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether behavioural intervention change attitude , knowledge , intake blood level vitamin D young adult . The hypothesis educational component use mobile smartphone 'app ' increase knowledge and/or intake vitamin D .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Among Young Adults : Intervention Study Using Mobile 'App ' .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 1825 year Must fluent English Must currently live Canada Must iPhone , iPad iPod Touch run iOS 7.0 high ( handheld 'app ' use intervention available Apple Store ; available Android Blackberry platform time ) Outside age group Not fluent English Not live Canada Does specify Apple device
